Notes.Text:
This update for libesmtp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-19977: Fixed stack-based buffer over-read in ntlm/ntlmstruct.c (bsc#1160462).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Title: Patchnames

Vulnerabilities.Description: libESMTP through 1.0.6 mishandles domain copying into a fixed-size buffer in ntlm_build_type_2 in ntlm/ntlmstruct.c, as demonstrated by a stack-based buffer over-read.
